===== Operations Program — RAW Unified Model v1 START =====

==== A) مقدمة البرنامج التشغيلي ====
--- SOURCE: Operations_Flow_Map.xlsx ---
-- Sheet: Sheet1 --
Step ID	Process Phase	Description	Owner Dept	SLA Target (h)	Start Time	End Time	Duration (h)	Status	Dependencies	Automation Trigger	Automation Action	Platform (Zapier/n8n)	Flow Owner	Webhook/Endpoint
OP-01	Order Intake	Order received via WooCommerce	E-commerce	2	2025-10-10 09:00	2025-10-10 09:15	0	Done	—	New Woo order	Create row in Orders_Register	Zapier	Ecom Lead	https://hooks.zapier.com/...
OP-02	Payment	Verify payment & fraud checks	Finance	4	2025-10-10 09:15	2025-10-10 09:45	0	Done	OP-01	Payment captured	Append to Invoices_Register	Zapier	Finance Manager	https://hooks.zapier.com/...
OP-03	Fulfillment	Pick, pack, print DHL label	Warehouse	8	2025-10-10 10:00	2025-10-10 12:00	0	In Progress	OP-02	Order ready to ship	Create DHL shipment	n8n	Ops Lead	https://n8n.yourdomain/api/webhook/fulfillment
OP-04	Shipment	Handover to DHL & update tracking	Logistics	24			0	Pending	OP-03	Tracking received	Update customer email/SMS	Zapier	Logistics	https://hooks.zapier.com/...
OP-05	Invoice & CRM	Post invoice, update CRM history	Finance/CRM	24			0	Pending	OP-02	Invoice posted	Create CRM note	Zapier	CRM Lead	https://hooks.zapier.com/...

==== C) نظام التشغيل الأساسي (Core Operations System) ====
--- SOURCE: Department_SOPs.docx ---

HAIROTICMEN – Department SOPsSales SOP1) Capture order → 2) Verify payment → 3) Confirm stock → 4) Coordinate fulfillment.Automations: Woo → Zapier → Sheets → Odoo.Warehouse SOPPick by SKU; scan barcode; pack with QC checklist; print DHL; update tracking.Automations: Sheets → n8n → DHL API.Customer Service SOPTriage tickets; FRT ≤ 1h (business); escalate P1; daily SLA digest.Automations: Gmail → Zapier → Tickets_Register.Finance SOPDaily reconciliation; invoice posting; credit notes; month-end close.Automations: Stripe/PayPal → Zapier → Invoices_Register.Marketing SOPContent plan execution; UTM tracking; weekly performance review.Automations: Calendar → Zapier → Report.
--- SOURCE: 06_دليل_التشغيل_القياسي_SOP.docx ---

دليل التشغيل القياسي (SOP) – برنامج الولاء HAIROTICMEN Rewardsتاريخ الإصدار: 2025-10-07 — النسخة العربية الرسميةالمقدمة والغرض من الدليليهدف هذا الدليل إلى توحيد الإجراءات التشغيلية اليومية والإدارية لبرنامج الولاء HAIROTICMEN Rewards من أجل ضمان الكفاءة والدقة والشفافية في جميع مراحل التشغيل. يمثل هذا الدليل مرجعًا رسميًا للموظفين والإداريين المعنيين بإدارة النظام الرقمي والميداني.1. الهيكل الإداري والتنظيمي• مدير برنامج الولاء: الإشراف العام على جميع العمليات.• قسم التقنية: إدارة تكامل الأنظمة والصيانة الدورية.• قسم المحاسبة: مطابقة البيانات المالية وقيد النقاط.• قسم التسويق: تشغيل الحملات الموسمية والمحتوى الترويجي.• قسم خدمة العملاء: معالجة الطلبات والشكاوى والتذاكر.• القسم القانوني: مراجعة الالتزام القانوني والضريبي.2. الإجراءات التشغيلية اليومية (Daily Operations)• فحص تذاكر الدعم والتصحيح الجديدة في نظام CRM.• التحقق من مزامنة الطلبات بين WooCommerce وmyCred.• معالجة أي نقاط غير مضافة تلقائيًا.• مراقبة نظام Zapier لتأكيد نجاح عمليات المزامنة.• الرد على استفسارات العملاء حول النقاط أو المكافآت خلال 24 ساعة.• مراجعة التنبيهات التلقائية الخاصة بانتهاء صلاحية النقاط.3. الإجراءات الأسبوعية (Weekly Tasks)• مطابقة جزئية بين رصيد النقاط في WooCommerce وmyCred وGoogle Sheets.• تحديث قاعدة بيانات الشركاء الجدد (Dealers / Stands / Reps / Affiliates).• تحليل أداء الحملات الأسبوعية على وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي.• مراجعة أداء الأنشطة التفاعلية (مراجعات، إحالات، محتوى UGC).• رفع تقرير أداء أسبوعي إلى مدير البرنامج يتضمن مؤشرات رئيسية.4. الإجراءات الشهرية (Monthly Tasks)• إعداد تقرير مالي شهري يتضمن إجمالي النقاط المكتسبة والمستبدلة.• مراجعة المخصصات المالية للنقاط (Loyalty Liabilities).• تحديث سياسات المكافآت الموسمية أو التحديات الخاصة.• تحليل معدل الاحتفاظ بالعملاء (Retention Rate).• مراجعة مؤشرات الأداء التشغيلية KPIs وتقديم التوصيات للتحسين.5. إدارة التذاكر والتصحيح (Tickets &amp; Adjustments)• يتم استقبال التذاكر من المستخدمين عبر نموذج “طلب تصحيح نقاط”.• يقوم فريق CRM بمراجعة الطلب خلال 24 ساعة.• يتم التصحيح في حال ثبوت الخطأ بعد مراجعة الأدلة.• يتم توثيق العملية في Google Sheets مع توقيع المسؤول.• تُغلق التذكرة خلال مدة لا تتجاوز 72 ساعة عمل.6. الإجراءات المحاسبية الخاصة بالنقاط• تسجيل قيد شهري لتقدير تكلفة النقاط الممنوحة كمصروف تسويقي.• احتساب الخصومات الناتجة عن استبدال النقاط ضمن بند الإيرادات المخفضة.• مطابقة الرصيد المالي للنقاط مع تقرير Google Sheets.• إعداد كشف المخصصات المالية للنقاط غير المستبدلة.• مراجعة سنوية بالتعاون مع المحاسب القانوني لضمان الدقة الضريبية.7. آلية المراجعة الدورية والتحسين المستمر• عقد اجتماع أسبوعي لفريق الولاء لمراجعة أداء النظام.• توثيق الملاحظات والمقترحات في Google Docs المشتركة.• تنفيذ التعديلات التقنية في بيئة Staging قبل الإطلاق.• مراجعة كل ثلاثة أشهر للتأكد من فعالية الإجراءات التشغيلية.8. الأمن الرقمي والامتثال• جميع الأنظمة مؤمنة ببروتوكول HTTPS وتشفير SSL.• نسخ احتياطي أسبوعي لقواعد البيانات عبر Google Drive وServer Backup.• مراقبة صلاحيات المستخدمين وفق مبدأ (Least Privilege).• التوافق الكامل مع متطلبات GDPR وGoBD.• مراجعة سجلات الدخول والتعديلات كل شهر.اعتماد الإصدار والموافقة الداخليةتمت مراجعة دليل التشغيل والموافقة عليه من قبل:• الإدارة التنفيذية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• الشؤون القانونية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• الإدارة المالية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• إدارة التسويق والعلاقات – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• مدير برنامج الولاء – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________
--- SOURCE: Operational SOP Checklists – Part 2.docx ---

Operational SOP Checklists – Part 2(Monthly Audits • Incident Response • AI Retraining • Compliance)11. Monthly Audit CycleA structured monthly review ensures that all automation systems, integrations, and AI modules remain compliant, efficient, and synchronized with Odoo ERP and MCP policies.AreaAudit FocusResponsibleEvidence LocationFinanceVAT compliance, USt-Voranmeldung, invoice archivingAccounting AI / Finance LeadDrive /Finance/Audit/SalesOrder accuracy vs. fulfillmentSales AI / Governance BotDrive /Reports/Sales_Audit/LogisticsStock reconciliation vs. actual countLogistics AI / Ops LeadDrive /Operations/Stock_Audit/MarketingCampaign ROI vs. budgetMarketing AI / Marketing LeadDrive /Marketing/Audit/PartnersAffiliate + Dealer payoutsPartner AI / Accounting LeadDrive /Partners/Audit/SecurityToken validity, role integrityGovernance Bot / IT AdminDrive /Governance/Audit/11.1 Audit ProcedureHairo Assistant compiles audit data from all AIs on the 1st of each month.Each Department Lead validates the accuracy and adds comments.Governance Bot consolidates all reports into a single PDF → stored at /00_Governance/Audit/Monthly_Report_YYYY-MM.pdf.Governance Committee signs off digitally (DocuSign or internal form).Audit summary auto-posted to Monday “Governance Board.”12. Incident Management Protocol12.1 ClassificationLevelDescriptionResponse TimeEscalationP1Major outage (Odoo, n8n down)Immediate (≤ 15 min)Hairo Assistant → IT AdminP2Data mismatch or delay &gt; 1hWithin 4hHairo Assistant → Dept LeadP3Minor sync or policy deviationWithin 24hGovernance Bot → Responsible AI12.2 Incident Response Workflow1️⃣ Detect anomaly → Hairo Assistant creates incident entry2️⃣ Assign responsible agent (human or AI)3️⃣ Attempt auto-repair (n8n retry or MCP command)4️⃣ If fails → escalate to Governance Board5️⃣ Root Cause Analysis (RCA) within 48h6️⃣ Implement corrective action7️⃣ Close incident → log to Drive /Logs/Incidents/Legend:Incidents are always tracked in Monday “Ops – Incidents” board.Each has fields: system, description, impact, status, owner, resolution link.12.3 Example Incident RecordIncident ID: INC-2025-045System: n8n – Woo Order SyncDescription: Duplicate order entry detectedImpact: 3 orders affectedRoot Cause: Missing external_id during webhook re-entryResolution: Added ID validation step to workflowClosed by: Ops Lead – 2025-10-1213. Root Cause Analysis (RCA) TemplateIncident ID: ___________________Date: _________________________System: _______________________Impact Summary: _______________Root Cause: ___________________Resolution Applied: ____________Prevention Plan: _______________Next Review: __________________Approved by Governance Bot: ___Storage:All RCA reports are archived inDrive /00_Governance/RCA_Archive/ and versioned by Hairo Assistant.14. AI Retraining &amp; Evaluation Cycle14.1 FrequencyMinor retraining: monthlyFull retraining: quarterlyEmergency retraining: post-incident14.2 Data CollectionHairo Assistant aggregates feedback data:Logs: /03_AI_Agents/_Logs/Human feedback: Monday “AI Feedback” boardEvaluation datasets: /03_AI_Agents/_EvalSets/14.3 Retraining Workflow1️⃣ Collect new data → Drive2️⃣ Clean &amp; normalize (Governance Bot)3️⃣ Label with department tags4️⃣ Regenerate embeddings / model fine-tune5️⃣ Validate results (accuracy ≥ 95%)6️⃣ Approve release → MCP tag update (AI-{Dept}-vX.Y)7️⃣ Roll out → Production8️⃣ Archive old index → /03_AI_Agents/_Archive/14.4 Performance KPIsMetricTargetOwnerAnswer accuracy≥ 95%Governance BotLatency (response)&lt; 2sHairo AssistantPolicy adherence100%All AIsDrift (semantic deviation)&lt; 3%Department Lead15. Compliance &amp; Legal SOP15.1 GDPR ComplianceEach data source tagged with:Department, Sensitivity, Retention, PII flag.AI access restricted to non-sensitive attributes unless authorized.Customer data deletion via Odoo + Woo → Drive purge API.Annual GDPR review by Legal Department.15.2 GoBD Compliance (Germany)All accounting records (invoices, receipts) stored for 10 years.No overwriting — only versioned updates.PDF invoices digitally signed with SHA-256 checksum.Financial audit logs exported to /Finance/Audit/GoBD_YYYY.zip.15.3 ISO27001 AlignmentSecurity policy accessible at /00_Governance/Security_Policy.docx.Periodic pen-tests every 6 months.Incident management mapped to ISO clause 6.1.3.16. Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) Procedures16.1 HITL Decision FlowAI action request → MCP policy check     │     ├─▶ Auto-approved (safe)     ├─▶ Requires human review (financial / legal)     │     └─▶ Sent to Monday “HITL Queue” board16.2 Review GuidelinesCategoryReview Required?ReviewerFinancial payout &gt; €500✅Accounting LeadContract or TOS change✅Legal LeadCustomer refund &gt; €100✅Sales LeadLoyalty tier upgrade❌Partner AI autoSEO content generation❌Marketing AI auto16.3 HITL Approval TemplateRequest ID: HITL-2025-102Action: Odoo payout confirmationAmount: €875.00Reviewed by: Finance LeadStatus: ✅ ApprovedSignature: __________________All HITL forms stored in /Governance/HITL_Approvals/.17. Reporting &amp; Escalation Path17.1 Reporting ChannelsTypePlatformFrequencyDaily OpsMonday BoardsDailyWeekly SummaryDrive + MondayWeeklyMonthly GovernanceDrive /00_Governance/MonthlyAnnual ReviewConsolidated ReportYearly17.2 Escalation HierarchyAI / Automation Error   │   ▼Department Lead   │   ▼Governance Bot   │   ▼Hairo Assistant   │   ▼AI Governance Committee   │   ▼Board of DirectorsLegend:Each stage has 24-hour maximum escalation window.Hairo Assistant provides automated summaries per escalation case.18. Key Performance Dashboards (Linked to Monday)Board NameKPIs TrackedUpdate FrequencyOps HealthSuccess %, Error %, LatencyHourlyFinance AuditInvoice count, DSO, VAT totalDailySales PerformanceOrders, Revenue, ConversionDailyMarketingROAS, CTR, EngagementDailyPartner ProgramsPayouts, Active tiers, ConversionsWeeklyGovernanceIncidents, Tokens, Compliance rateWeekly19. AI Maintenance Routine19.1 DailyClear temporary cache and re-index Drive vectors.Refresh MCP token set.Validate n8n + Zapier workflow states.19.2 WeeklyCheck Drive dataset sizes.Purge expired logs.Review feedback for retraining.19.3 MonthlyValidate AI output quality using evaluation dataset.Measure accuracy / drift metrics.Submit summary to Governance Board.20. SOP Review and Continuous ImprovementAll SOPs are living documents, versioned in /00_Governance/SOP_Versions/.Governance Bot creates reminders for review every 6 months.Proposed updates follow workflow:Change Request → Governance Review → Approval → Version Tag → ReleaseEach new version receives tag SOP_vX.Y_YYYY-MM-DD.Hairo Assistant auto-generates diff summary and emails stakeholders.✅ End of Operational SOP Checklists – Part 2
--- SOURCE: Operational SOP Checklists – Part 1 .docx ---

Operational SOP Checklists – Part 1(Startup • Daily • Weekly Operations)1. PurposeThis document defines the Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for all operational layers of the HAIROTICMEN digital ecosystem — including Odoo ERP, WooCommerce, n8n, Zapier, Google Drive, Monday.com, and the MCP (Hairo Assistant).It ensures every department follows consistent, auditable, and AI-assisted workflows.2. ScopeApplies to all internal users, AIs, and integrations:Sales &amp; Customer ServiceAccounting &amp; FinanceLogistics &amp; FulfilmentMarketing &amp; MediaPartner Programs (Dealers, Affiliates, Stands)Governance &amp; Compliance3. System Startup Checklist (Daily 06:30 CET)StepActionResponsibleVerification1Check OVH server status (uptime, CPU &lt; 70 %)IT AdminServer OK log2Verify PostgreSQL service (Odoo DB)IT Adminsystemctl status postgresql3Confirm n8n and Zapier queues are activeOps Leadn8n dashboard shows ✅ nodes4Test MCP Gateway token renewalGovernance Bot / Hairo Assistant200 OK – Token Valid5Check Drive mount availability (/mnt/drive)IT AdminFolder accessible6Ping Monday API for statusOps Leadpong response7Run AI health ping (assistant.ping())Hairo AssistantAll modules respond “Healthy”4. Daily Operations – by Department4.1 Sales &amp; Customer ServiceTaskToolFrequencyResponsibleImport Woo orders → Odoo via n8nn8n Flow #001HourlySales AIValidate payments and update statusOdoo AccountingDailySales LeadGenerate invoice PDFs → Driven8n autoDaily 16:00Accounting AIUpdate Monday Sales Boardn8n → MondayEvery 2 hSales AICheck customer messages (Drive → CRM)Zapier + Odoo CRMDailySupport Team4.2 Accounting &amp; FinanceTaskToolFrequencyResponsiblePost invoices &amp; match paymentsOdooDailyAccounting AIReview USt summaryOdoo Reports → DriveWeeklyFinance LeadValidate myCred payouts to partnersOdoo + n8nDailyPartner AIBackup invoices to Drive /Finance/Invoicesn8nDailyOps BotCross-check VAT entries (BWA)Odoo → DriveWeeklyFinance Lead4.3 Logistics &amp; FulfilmentTaskToolFrequencyResponsibleSync stock Odoo ↔ Woon8n Flow #003Every hourLogistics AITrack DHL shipmentsZapier → DHL APIDailyOps BotFlag delayed orders &gt; 48 hn8n TriggerContinuousLogistics LeadGenerate RMA listOdooWeeklySupport Team4.4 Marketing &amp; MediaTaskToolFrequencyResponsibleSync Meta Ads leads → Odoo CRMZapierHourlyMarketing AIUpload daily metrics → Drive /Marketing/ZapierDaily 23:00Marketing AIUpdate Monday Campaign Boardn8n → MondayDailyMarketing LeadTrigger Hairo Assistant SEO auditMCP CommandWeeklyGovernance Bot4.5 Partner ProgramsTaskToolFrequencyResponsibleFetch SliceWP conversionsn8nDailyPartner AICompute payouts → Odoon8nWeeklyAccounting AIUpdate loyalty tiers via myCredMCPDailyPartner AISync partner dashboard (Monday)n8n → MondayWeeklyPartner Lead4.6 Governance &amp; ComplianceTaskToolFrequencyResponsibleReview MCP logs / anomaliesDrive /Logs/MCP_ActivityDailyGovernance BotRun security scan (Odoo / Woo)IT ScriptWeeklyIT AdminCheck GDPR retention timersDriveWeeklyCompliance AIApprove system updates &amp; tokensMonday Governance BoardWeeklyGovernance Committee5. AI Monitoring TasksEach AI module executes self-checks every 4 hours:[Sales AI] → order_sync_health()[Accounting AI] → invoice_balance_check()[Logistics AI] → stock_variance_scan()[Marketing AI] → campaign_data_freshness()[Partner AI] → payout_validation()If any deviation &gt; threshold:Write alert to Drive /Logs/Alerts/Notify Hairo Assistant → Monday Ops Board6. Daily Reporting RoutineTimeReportSourceDestination08:00System Health SummaryHairo AssistantMonday Ops Board12:00Order + Invoice Statusn8n / OdooDrive /Reports/Daily16:00Inventory VarianceOdoo → DriveMonday Logistics Board20:00Marketing PerformanceZapier → DriveMonday Marketing Board7. Weekly Review CycleDayDepartmentTaskOutputMondaySalesPipeline review + conversion analysisReport_Sales_Week .docxTuesdayAccountingReconciliation + BWA updateFinance_Week .xlsxWednesdayLogisticsDelivery speed auditOps_Week .docxThursdayMarketingROAS + engagement reviewMarketing_Week .xlsxFridayGovernanceIncident summary + token rotationGovernance_Week .docx8. Backup &amp; Archiving RoutineOdoo DB → OVH Backup (volume)n8n workflows → Drive /Backups/n8n/Logs → Drive /Logs/YYYY-MM/Drive archive → Google VaultBackup validation runs daily 22:00 via n8n.Governance Bot checks file integrity (SHA-256 hash match).9. User Access &amp; Role ValidationSystemRolePrivilegesReviewOdooAdmin / Finance / SalesFull + module-limitedMonthlyWooCommerceShop ManagerLimited orders viewQuarterlyn8nOps EngineerWorkflow editMonthlyZapierMarketing TeamRead + runQuarterlyDriveAll usersRead by roleQuarterlyMondayAll Dept LeadsWrite on own boardMonthly10. Governance Sign-Off TemplateSystem: ______________________Date: ________________________Reviewer: ____________________Status:  [✅ Operational] / [⚠️ Minor Issues] / [❌ Critical]Notes:_____________________________________________________________Next Review Date: ___________________Signature: __________________________All SOP reviews are archived in /00_Governance/SOP_Reviews/and logged by Hairo Assistant automatically after submission.✅ End of Operational SOP Checklists – Part 1(Part 2 will cover monthly audits, failure recovery, AI retraining, and incident response.)

==== F) Pick-Pack-Ship SOP ====
--- SOURCE: Shipping_Logistics_HAIROTICMEN.docx ---

HAIROTICMEN SYSTEM FILE 16اسم النظام: Shipping &amp; Logistics System – نظام الشحن واللوجستياتنظرة عامةنظام الشحن في HAIROTICMEN يهدف إلى إدارة عمليات الشحن داخل ألمانيا والاتحاد الأوروبي، وضمان تجربة توصيل موثوقة وسريعة للعملاء (أفراد وتجار). يشمل النظام خدمات التوصيل، تتبع الشحنات، إدارة المرتجعات، والتكامل مع WooCommerce وDHL.الأهداف- تحديد خيارات شحن ذكية حسب نوع المستخدم والموقع- تقديم شحن مجاني بناءً على الحد الأدنى للطلب- تسهيل إدارة المرتجعات والاستبدال- تتبع الشحنات أوتوماتيكيًا من الطلب حتى التسليمالمكونات1. إعداد المناطق:- داخل برلين: شحن مجاني- باقي ألمانيا: شحن عبر DHL – مجاني للطلبات فوق 49.99€- الاتحاد الأوروبي: شحن عبر DHL – مجاني للطلبات فوق 99.99€- التجار: خيارات خاصة (استلام – شحن جماعي – شحن بشركة)2. أدوات الشحن المستخدمة:- Flexible Shipping + Table Rate Shipping (WooCommerce)- Advanced Shipment Tracking- DHL for WooCommerce (تكامل مباشر مع حساب DHL)3. إدارة المرتجعات:- نموذج طلب استرجاع- شروط: خلال 14 يوم – غير مستخدم – بحالة جيدة- إشعار تلقائي للإدارة وتحديث حالة الطلب4. خيارات خاصة بالتجار:- استلام من المستودع (0€)- شحن DHL بأسعار الجملة- شحن كميات كبيرة (كونتينر / طلب مجمّع)الأتمتة- إرسال رقم تتبع تلقائي بعد إنشاء الشحنة- إشعار تلقائي عند فشل التوصيل أو تأخير- تحديث حالة الطلب في WooCommerce تلقائيًا- توليد فاتورة / بوليصة الشحن مباشرةالجاهزية- إعداد جميع مناطق الشحن داخل WooCommerce- إعداد شروط الشحن المجاني حسب الفئة والسعر- تكامل DHL مفعل وجاهز- نماذج المرتجعات جاهزة- تم اختبار النظام بنجاح مع أوامر تجريبية

-- Sheet: 00_Dashboard --
HAIROTICMEN – Logistics & Packaging Dashboard (v3)

Region-Filter: 06_Dashboard_Data!A2 (DE / EU / Alle)

Gesamtkosten (Versand + Retouren) pro Monat – gefiltert nach Region
-- Sheet: READ_ME_Anleitung --
Plausibilitäts-Checks in 01_Versandübersicht: Volumengewicht, DHL-Grenzen, Pflichtfelder, Trackingpflicht.
Retourenkosten-Automatik in 04_Retouren: nutzt Hinversand-Kosten aus Versandübersicht + Rückversand laut DHL_Kategorien + Wiedereinlagerung (%).
Monatskosten inkl. Retouren in 05_Kosten_Summary; Region-gefiltertes Dashboard unter 00_Dashboard.
Bitte trage unter 03_DHL_Kategorien die realen DE/EU-Preise ein.
Datenimport: Kopiere deine bestehenden Zeilen in 01_Versandübersicht (Spaltenstruktur beachten).

==== G) إدارة الطلبات (Order Management) ====

--- SOURCE: Return_Policy_Manual.docx ---

HAIROTICMEN – Return Policy &amp; RMA Manual (DHL)Rules and workflow for returns, exchanges, and damage claims under our DHL commercial contract.Key Terms• Small Packet (≤1kg; max 25×8×35 cm) — Return flat €4.99; Insurance up to €20• Paket (1–31.5kg) — Insurance up to €20 by default• RMA required; original packaging when possibleRMA Workflow1) Create RMA in CRM2) Validate eligibility (B2C 14 days; B2B per agreement)3) Issue DHL return label4) Inspect and book into Stock Log5) Issue Credit Note/replacement; reverse loyalty pointsSLA &amp; Exceptions• Intake ≤48h; credit ≤7 business days• Damaged-in-transit: file DHL claim promptly• Hygiene items: restrictions apply
--- SOURCE: HAIROTICMEN_SOP_RMA_AR_Short_2025-10-04.docx ---

ملخص تنفيذي داخلي – SOP الإرجاع/الاستبدال (RMA) – HAIROTICMENالتاريخ: 2025-10-04الهدفتوحيد إجراءات الإرجاع/الاستبدال/الشكاوى لضمان تجربة مستخدم ممتازة وتقليل زمن المعالجة.الإطار القانوني (ألمانيا/EU)- حق الانسحاب (Widerruf) 14 يومًا من الاستلام.- المنتجات التجميلية المفتوحة: استبدال/تعويض فقط إذا كانت معيبة.- إعادة المبلغ لنفس وسيلة الدفع خلال ≤ 5 أيام عمل من استلام المرتجع.قنوات التواصل وSLA- قنوات: الشات الحي، البريد، واتساب، نموذج الاتصال.- زمن الاستجابة: ≤ 2 ساعة (10–18 CET)، ≤ 24 ساعة خارج الدوام.خطوات الإرجاع (Widerruf)1) تعبئة نموذج RMA أونلاين.2) إصدار رقم RMA + ملصق DHL (حسب السياسة).3) فحص المستودع خلال ≤ 48 ساعة (الختم/التسريب/الحالة).4) اعتماد الاسترداد المالي ≤ 5 أيام أو قسيمة حسب رغبة العميل.خطوات العيب/الضرر (Defekt)1) استلام صور المنتج والتغليف + الوصف.2) توثيق الدُفعة/الصلاحية، تقرير QC.3) إرسال بديل فوري أو استرداد.4) تحليل السبب الجذري عند التكرار.الاستبدال (خطأ/مقاس/لون)1) إنشاء RMA + ملصق عودة.2) فحص الوارد ثم شحن البديل.3) تحصيل فرق السعر إن وُجد، وإبلاغ العميل.مستندات داعمة- نموذج RMA (DE)- SOP التفصيلي (DE)- قوالب البريد (DE)- سياسة الإرجاع على الموقع (DE)مؤشرات الأداء (KPIs)- زمن الموافقة/الاسترداد (يوم)- نسبة الإرجاع %- أسباب الإرجاع Top 5- NPS بعد RMAالمسؤوليات (RACI)- CX: استقبال الطلبات والتواصل- Ops: فحص المرتجعات والمستودع- QA: توثيق العيوب وضبط الجودة- Finance: الاستردادات- Tech: تكامل DHL/النماذج
--- SOURCE: HAIROTICMEN_SOP_Returns_RMA_DE_2025-10-04.docx ---

HAIROTICMEN – SOP Rückgabe &amp; RMA (DE)Datum: 2025-10-04Zweck &amp; GeltungsbereichDieses Dokument beschreibt den End-to-End Prozess für Widerruf (14 Tage), Umtausch und Reklamation (defekt/Qualitätsmangel) für Endkunden in Deutschland und EU.Rechtlicher Rahmen (Kurz)• Widerrufsrecht: 14 Tage ab Zustellung (ungeöffnete Ware für volle Erstattung).• Geöffnete Kosmetik: nur bei Mangel/Defekt ersetzbar.• Erstattung über dieselbe Zahlungsart, Bearbeitungszeit ≤ 5 Werktage ab Wareneingang.Kontaktkanäle &amp; SLA• Kanäle: Live-Chat, E‑Mail, WhatsApp, Kontaktformular.• SLA: Antwort ≤ 2 h (10–18 CET), ≤ 24 h außerhalb der Zeiten.Rückgabeprozess (Widerruf) – Schritt für Schritt1) Kunde füllt Online‑Formular aus (Bestellnr., Grund, ungeöffnet).2) System erzeugt RMA‑Nummer und sendet DHL‑Retourenlabel (falls kostenpflichtig: Hinweis).3) Wareneingang im Lager (≤ 48 h prüfen): Unversehrtheit, Siegel, Verpackung.4) Entscheidung &amp; Erstattung (≤ 5 WT) oder Gutschein (auf Wunsch).Reklamation/Defekt – Schritt für Schritt1) Kunde sendet Fotos vom Produkt &amp; Verpackung + Beschreibung.2) QC prüft Batch/Lot, dokumentiert Befund.3) Lösung: Ersatzversand oder Erstattung; Kundennotiz im CRM.4) Root Cause Analyse (RCA) bei Häufung: Verpackung/Transport verbessern.Umtausch (falscher Artikel/Variante)1) RMA anlegen → DHL Rücksendeetikett.2) Eingang prüfen → korrekten Artikel versenden.3) Differenzbetrag verrechnen (falls nötig) + Info an Kunden.Lager &amp; Wareneingang (QC)• Checkliste: Siegel intakt, kein Auslaufen, Etikett sauber, Unversehrt.• Rückläufer nach Zustand klassifizieren: A (neu), B (leicht beschädigte Verpackung), C (defekt) – Entsorgungsrichtlinie beachten.Kommunikation – Vorlagen (DE)• RMA erstellen: „Deine RMA‑Nr. {rma} ist erstellt. Hier ist dein Rücksendeetikett: {label_link}.“• Eingang: „Deine Rücksendung ist angekommen. Wir prüfen innerhalb von 48 h.“• Entscheidung: „Erstattung veranlasst (bis 5 WT)“ / „Ersatz versendet: Tracking {tracking_link}“.Metriken &amp; Reporting• KPIs: Rücksendequote %, Zeit bis Erstattung (d), NPS nach RMA, Ursachen (Top 5).• Monatlicher Bericht an Ops &amp; QA.Rollen &amp; Verantwortlichkeiten (RACI)• CX Lead (R) – Annahme &amp; Kundenkommunikation• Ops Lead (R) – Lager und Wareneingang• QA (R) – Qualitätsprüfung• Finance (A) – Erstattungen• CEO (I) – Überblick• Tech (C) – Automationen &amp; EtikettenCheckliste Go‑Live☐ Formular online &amp; getestet☐ E‑Mail‑Vorlagen aktiv☐ DHL‑Retourenprozess ok☐ QC‑Checkliste kommuniziert☐ SLA im Helpdesk eingestellt☐ Berichtsformat angelegt
--- SOURCE: HAIROTICMEN_Returns_Tracking_Log.xlsx ---

--- SOURCE: HAIROTICMEN_Refund_Return_Policy_EN.docx ---

Refund and Return Policy – HAIROTICMEN.deOverviewOur refund and return policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.Additional Non-returnable Items- Gift cards- Downloadable software products- Some health and personal care itemsTo complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.Partial RefundsThere are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:- Book with obvious signs of use- CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened- Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error- Any item that is returned more than 30 days after deliveryRefundsOnce your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain number of days.Late or Missing RefundsIf you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.Sale ItemsOnly regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.ExchangesWe only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.GiftsIf the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.Shipping ReturnsTo return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.Need Help?Contact us at {email address} for questions related to refunds and returns.

--- SOURCE: Monday_Dashboard_Design.docx ---

Monday Dashboard Design – HAIROTICMENThis document specifies management dashboards on Monday.com for executive visibility and AI-driven reporting. It defines boards, groups, columns, KPIs, data refresh, and alert logic connected to MCP/n8n/Zapier.1) Board Inventory1) Exec – Company KPIs (global view)  2) Sales – Pipeline &amp; Orders  3) Finance – Invoicing &amp; Cashflow  4) Logistics – Fulfillment &amp; RMA  5) Marketing – Campaigns &amp; Social Analytics  6) Partners – Tiers &amp; Payouts  7) Ops – Automation Incidents &amp; System Health2) Board Schema (Example: Exec – Company KPIs)Groups: Current Month, Previous Month, Quarterly  Columns:• KPI Name (text)  • Target (number)  • Actual (number)  • Variance % (formula)  • Trend (status)  • Owner (people)  • Last Update (date)  Data Source: n8n aggregation jobs; AI narrative via Hairo Assistant to “Notes” column.3) Board Schema DetailsSales – Pipeline &amp; Orders:• KPIs: Conversion %, AOV, Monthly Revenue, Forecast Accuracy  • Automation: n8n push daily; Sales AI comments key changes.Finance – Invoicing &amp; Cashflow:• KPIs: USt due, DSO, Reconciliation %, BWA GM%  • Alerts: overdue invoices &gt;30 days → red status; email via Zapier.Logistics – Fulfillment &amp; RMA:• KPIs: On-time Delivery %, Stock Accuracy %, RMA Resolution Time  • Alerts: DHL delays &gt;48h → incident item created.Marketing – Campaigns &amp; Social:• KPIs: ROAS, CTR, Engagement, Content Output, SEO Visibility  • Sync: Zapier daily; AI insights appended weekly.Partners – Tiers &amp; Payouts:• KPIs: Active partners, payouts, tier movements, disputes  • Sync: n8n weekly; HITL approval markers.4) Refresh &amp; Alert Policy• Sales/Finance: daily refresh at 07:30 CET.  • Logistics: hourly refresh; immediate incident creation on exceptions.  • Marketing: daily at 08:00 CET; weekly narrative.  • Partners: weekly at 09:00 CET.  • Ops Health: every 15 minutes; success rate threshold 98%.5) Access Model• Executives: read-all, comment, limited write.  • Department Leads: write to their board only.  • AI Agents: write to “Notes/Updates” and KPIs via API; no schema edits.  • Visitors: read-only shared dashboards (sanitized).

==== T) n8n / Zapier Automations ====

HAIROTICMEN – Zapier Integration &amp; Automation MapThis document outlines the smart automation structure using Zapier to connect various tools with Monday.com, WooCommerce, CRM, and GPT assistant.✅ Part 1: Core Zaps – Main Workflow#TriggerActionPurpose1Contact Form SubmissionCreate Item in Customer MessagesReceive client messages2Loyalty Signup FormCreate Item in Active CustomersRegister loyalty member3WhatsApp Message (via Twilio/360dialog)Create Item in Customer MessagesLog WhatsApp messages4New Order in WooCommerceCreate Item in Orders and ReordersRecord orders automatically5New Product PurchaseAdd Loyalty Points + Update Points LogGrant loyalty points6Customer RefundLog into Returns &amp; DamagesTrack refunds7Approved DealerCreate Row in Dealer Commission LogStart dealer commission8Affiliate Sale (SliceWP)Log Sale + Update Affiliate TrackerTrack affiliate sales9Completed OrderCreate Task in Follow-Up TasksTrigger customer follow-up10Tag VIP CustomerNotify GPT + Create Offer TaskGenerate special offers🔄 Part 2: Google Sheets &amp; GPT Smart Triggers#TriggerToolAction1New Row in Sheet "Product Feedback"Google SheetsCreate item in Follow-Up Tasks2Weekly Loyalty SummaryGoogle SheetsSend report via Email + Save PDF3VIP Tag AddedZapier + GPTGenerate Personalized Email Offer4Monthly Orders ReportGPT + MondaySummarize → Generate PDF → Email to Admin

أتمتة Zapier – سير العمل والتنبيهاتتاريخ الإصدار: 2025-10-07 — النسخة العربية الرسميةالأهدافأتمتة مزامنة الأحداث والتقارير والتنبيهات لتقليل الأخطاء اليدوية وزيادة سرعة الاستجابة.Zaps الأساسيةWoo → myCred (منح نقاط)Woo Refund → myCred (خصم نقاط)myCred Event → Google Sheets (log)SliceWP Payout → Email通知Error Catch → Slack/Email AlertMonthly Close → Build KPI Sheetإدارة الأخطاءمسارات بديلة (Paths)؛ إعادة المحاولة؛ سجل Sync_Errors في Sheets؛ إشعار مدير البرنامج.الأمانحفظ المفاتيح API في مخزن آمن؛ الحد من الصلاحيات؛ مراقبة الاستخدام الشهري.اعتماد الإصدار والموافقة الداخليةتمت مراجعة هذه الوثيقة والموافقة عليها من قبل:• الإدارة التنفيذية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• الشؤون القانونية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• الإدارة المالية – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• إدارة التسويق والعلاقات – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________• مدير برنامج الولاء – ____________ التوقيع ____________ التاريخ ____________

-- Sheet: Sheet1 --
القسم	اللوحة	السيناريو	الإجراء	نص الإشعار / التنفيذ
Sales	الطلبات الواردة	عند إنشاء طلب جديد	item created → notify person in column 'المسؤول'	تم تسجيل طلب جديد من العميل: {اسم العميل} رقم الطلب: {رقم الطلب}
Sales	الطلبات الواردة	عند تغيير الحالة إلى تم	status changes to تم → notify person (المحاسبة)	الطلب رقم {رقم الطلب} تم إتمامه. الرجاء إصدار الفاتورة.
Sales	الطلبات الواردة	عند تغيير الحالة إلى ملغاة	status changes to ملغاة → notify customer service	تم إلغاء الطلب رقم {رقم الطلب}. يرجى التواصل مع العميل.
Sales	الطلبات الواردة	بعد 3 أيام من تاريخ الطلب ولم تكتمل	every 3 days → if status is not تم → notify المسؤول	مر 3 أيام على الطلب رقم {رقم الطلب} ولم يتم تحديث الحالة.
Sales	مندوبي المبيعات	عند إدخال عميل جديد	item created → create item in متابعة العملاء	تمت إضافة عميل جديد. الرجاء المتابعة.
Marketing	الحملات الإعلانية	قبل بدء الحملة بـ3 أيام	3 days before date → notify المسؤول	تبقّى 3 أيام على بداية الحملة: {اسم الحملة}
Marketing	الحملات الإعلانية	عند انتهاء الحملة	status changes to منتهي → create item in تحليل الأداء	تم انتهاء الحملة، يرجى تحليل النتائج.
Marketing	الحملات الإعلانية	عند تفعيل الحملة	status changes to Live → notify team	الحملة الآن Live: {اسم الحملة}
Marketing	جدول المحتوى	قبل 24 ساعة من النشر	1 day before تاريخ النشر → notify المسؤول	موعد نشر محتوى جديد غدًا: {عنوان المحتوى}
Marketing	جدول المحتوى	إذا لم يتم التحديث بعد النشر	2 days after تاريخ النشر and status not مكتمل → notify المسؤول	لم يتم تحديث حالة المحتوى: {عنوان المحتوى}
Inventory	المخزون الحالي	عند انخفاض الكمية	if quantity < 10 → notify التوريد	الكمية المتبقية للمنتج {اسم المنتج} منخفضة
Inventory	المنتجات التالفة	عند تسجيل منتج تالف	item created → notify الدعم والمحاسبة	تم تسجيل منتج تالف: {اسم المنتج}
Inventory	المنتجات التالفة	إذا تجاوز العدد 5	if total damage > 5 for product → notify الإدارة	تم تجاوز الحد المقبول للتالف في المنتج: {اسم المنتج}
Shipping	الشحن	عند اكتمال التوصيل	status changes to تم التوصيل → notify CRM	تم توصيل الطلب {رقم الطلب}، يرجى تأكيد رضا العميل
Shipping	الشحن	إذا بقي قيد الشحن لأكثر من 5 أيام	every 5 days and status is قيد الشحن → notify الشحن	الطلب {رقم الطلب} في حالة شحن منذ أكثر من 5 أيام
CRM	رسائل العملاء	عند رسالة جديدة	item created → notify الدعم	تم تسجيل رسالة من العميل: {اسم العميل}
Loyalty Program	النقاط والرتب	عند تجاوز نقاط محددة	if points > 100 → notify CRM	العميل {الاسم} مؤهل للترقية.
Loyalty Program	الهدايا والجوائز	عند نفاد الهدية	if quantity = 0 → notify التوريد	تم نفاد مخزون الهدية: {اسم الهدية}
Partners & Affiliates	التجار	عند تفعيل تاجر جديد	status changes to مفعل → notify فريق المبيعات	تم تفعيل تاجر جديد: {اسم التاجر}
Partners & Affiliates	الأفلييت	عند تحقيق 10 تحويلات	if conversions >= 10 → notify المسؤول	المسوق {اسم المسوق} حقق 10 تحويلات – مكافأة مستحقة!
HAIROTIC Stand	طلبات الانضمام	عند تقديم طلب جديد	item created → notify الإدارة	تم تقديم طلب جديد للانضمام: {اسم الصالون}
HAIROTIC Stand	أداء الستاند	عند انخفاض المبيعات	if sales < 5 → notify الدعم	مبيعات ستاند {اسم الصالون} منخفضة هذا الشهر.
--- SOURCE: External_Automation_Zapier_Flows.docx ---

External Automation – Zapier Flows Documentation (HAIROTICMEN)This document details the complete external automation layer for HAIROTICMEN, implemented via **Zapier**. These automations connect external marketing, communication, and productivity platforms — including Meta Ads, Google Ads, Gmail, Slack, WhatsApp Business, YouTube, and Odoo CRM — into the central intelligence network managed by **Hairo Assistant**. Zapier serves as the outer communication bridge for customer interaction, campaign execution, and partner communication beyond the OVH environment.1) Purpose &amp; ScopeThe Zapier automation layer extends the capabilities of the internal n8n automations by enabling secure cloud-based integrations with third-party SaaS systems that cannot directly connect to the OVH server. Its purpose is to execute marketing, communication, and customer engagement tasks while maintaining brand consistency and data integrity.2) Core Integration PlatformsZapier connects to and orchestrates:  • Meta (Facebook &amp; Instagram Ads Manager).  • Google Ads &amp; YouTube Studio.  • Gmail &amp; Google Workspace tools.  • Slack &amp; WhatsApp Business (Twilio or Meta Cloud API).  • TikTok Ads &amp; TikTok for Business.  • Monday.com (for public campaign reporting).  • Odoo CRM (lead intake &amp; feedback loop).  • Google Drive (asset storage and log archiving).  3) Design Principles• One-way outbound automation for security isolation.  • All Zapier actions mirrored in internal logs via n8n for traceability.  • Brand and tone enforcement through centralized content templates in Drive.  • Error handling and fallbacks route to Hairo Assistant via MCP.  • Monthly export of all active Zaps for compliance auditing.  4) Workflow CategoriesZapier automations are organized into seven main categories:  1. Lead Intake &amp; CRM Sync  2. Marketing Campaign Management  3. Social Media Content Distribution  4. Customer Communication (Email, WhatsApp, Slack)  5. Partner Notifications &amp; Loyalty Updates  6. Reputation &amp; Feedback Monitoring  7. Reporting &amp; Analytics Delivery  5) Key Zapier Flow SpecificationsA) Meta Ads → Odoo CRM Lead IntakeTrigger: New lead submitted from Facebook or Instagram Ad Form.  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve form submission data.  2. Validate required fields and consent checkbox.  3. Create or update lead in Odoo CRM (external_id='meta:{lead_id}').  4. Notify Sales AI for follow-up.  5. Save copy of submission in Drive /Marketing/Leads/YYYY-MM/.  6. Log completion in Monday “Lead Intake” board.  B) Google Ads → ROI Analysis ReportTrigger: Weekly schedule (Monday 08:00 CET).  Flow Steps:  1. Fetch campaign data from Google Ads (CTR, conversions, spend).  2. Compare performance vs. previous week using Drive metrics.  3. Generate summary table → export as “Ad_Performance_{week}.xlsx”.  4. Send email report to management via Gmail.  5. Update Marketing AI for learning dataset.  C) Gmail → Odoo CRM Communication LogTrigger: New email received (inbox: Sales or Support).  Flow Steps:  1. Extract sender, subject, and thread context.  2. Match contact with Odoo CRM partner.  3. Create CRM activity entry under that record.  4. Attach email body as note (Drive archive optional).  5. Trigger MCP “communication_logged” event for AI insight update.  D) WhatsApp Business → CRM &amp; SupportTrigger: Incoming WhatsApp message via Meta Cloud API.  Flow Steps:  1. Detect message type (text, image, voice).  2. Match sender to partner/customer in Odoo CRM.  3. Create new ticket if keyword detected (e.g., “support”, “return”, “dealer”).  4. Notify Sales or Logistics AI depending on category.  5. Auto-reply via template messages (Drive /Templates/WhatsApp/).  E) TikTok → Social Analytics DashboardTrigger: Daily schedule (23:00 CET).  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve analytics (views, engagement, CTR).  2. Aggregate with Meta &amp; YouTube data.  3. Update Monday “Social Analytics” board.  4. Store JSON response in Drive /Reports/Social_Metrics/YYYY-MM-DD.json.  5. Trigger Marketing AI “analytics_updated” event.  F) Reputation &amp; Feedback MonitoringTrigger: New review posted on Google Maps or Meta Page.  Flow Steps:  1. Fetch review content &amp; rating.  2. Analyze sentiment using integrated AI sentiment model.  3. If negative (&lt;3 stars):     – Create incident ticket in CRM.     – Notify Hairo Assistant for escalation.  4. If positive: add to Drive /Marketing/Testimonials/.  6) Data Flow SummaryTypical Flow Direction:  External Platform (Meta, Google, TikTok, WhatsApp) → Zapier → Odoo CRM → Drive → Monday → Hairo Assistant.  Reverse actions (CRM → Zapier → platform) only allowed for outbound notifications or ad budget adjustments.  Data enrichment and AI context updates occur through MCP message passing.  7) Error Handling &amp; Fallbacks• Retry policy: 3 attempts (2m / 5m / 10m).  • Failures pushed to n8n fallback endpoint (/api/zapier_fallback).  • AI escalation via MCP “alert_zap_failed”.  • Monday “Automation Incidents” board receives failed Zap summary.  • Errors older than 30 days archived in Drive /Logs/Zapier_Errors/.  8) Security &amp; Access Control• OAuth 2.0 authentication for all platform connections.  • Token rotation every 90 days; refresh automated via Zapier Secrets Manager.  • Sensitive data (names, phone numbers) redacted before logging.  • Only outbound operations allowed to Odoo CRM; no direct access to server database.  • GDPR-compliant retention: logs retained 12 months; sensitive data masked.  9) Monitoring &amp; Reporting• Zapier Activity History synced daily to Drive /Logs/Zapier_History/.  • Hairo Assistant receives daily report summarizing:    – Total successful runs    – Failure rate (%)    – Top Zaps by execution volume  • Monthly analytics report auto-generated for management review.  10) Governance &amp; Versioning• All active Zaps exported monthly to Drive /Governance/Zapier_Exports/.  • Naming Convention: {Category}_{Flow}_v{major.minor}.zap.  • Linked to AI departmental versions (e.g., AI-MARKETING-v2.1).  • Change requests logged in Drive /Governance/Zapier_Change_Log.xlsx.  • Quarterly security audit led by Hairo Assistant.  
--- SOURCE: Internal_Automation_n8n_Flows.docx ---

Internal Automation – n8n Flows Documentation (HAIROTICMEN)This document describes the complete internal automation layer for HAIROTICMEN, implemented via n8n running on the OVH private server. All automations execute operational tasks between Odoo ERP, WooCommerce, myCred, SliceWP, CRM, and Google Drive. These flows are orchestrated under the supervision of Hairo Assistant via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and form the execution backbone of the brand’s intelligent infrastructure.1) Architecture Overviewn8n serves as the internal workflow engine responsible for data synchronization, automation of repetitive operations, report generation, and system integrations. It connects directly to HAIROTICMEN’s self-hosted Odoo, WooCommerce APIs, and Google Drive. Each workflow (flow) is fully version-controlled, logged, and monitored for performance and compliance.2) Design Principles• Event-driven execution (webhooks, schedules, triggers).  • Idempotent operations using external_id references.  • All workflows tagged by department and versioned in Google Drive (/Governance/n8n_Flows/).  • Error recovery, retries, and DLQ (Dead Letter Queue) mechanism.  • End-to-end traceability: each run carries correlation_id and source metadata.  • Human-in-the-loop (HITL) approval for sensitive financial or policy actions.  3) Core System Connections• Odoo ERP: REST API + XMLRPC for accounting, sales, stock, and CRM modules.  • WooCommerce: REST API for orders, products, and customers.  • myCred: REST API for points and loyalty ledger management.  • SliceWP: REST API for affiliate conversions and payout verification.  • Google Drive: OAuth service connection for document logging and report storage.  • Monday.com: API (read-only for most flows, write for summary metrics).  • MCP Proxy: JSON-RPC interface for Hairo Assistant command routing.  4) Key Workflow CategoriesAll n8n workflows are categorized into six main groups aligned with departmental AIs:1. Sales Automation  2. Accounting &amp; Finance Automation  3. Logistics &amp; Warehouse Automation  4. Partner &amp; Loyalty Automation  5. Marketing Reporting Automation  6. Administrative &amp; Governance Automation  5) Example Workflow SpecificationsBelow are representative n8n flow designs and logic for key business processes.A) Woo → Odoo Order SyncTrigger: WooCommerce webhook (order.created / order.paid)  Flow Steps:  1. Validate payload integrity.  2. Search Odoo for existing order (external_id='woo:{order_id}').  3. If not found → create sales order in Odoo with mapped lines, tax, and partner.  4. Confirm sale and post invoice if payment verified.  5. Generate PDF invoice → upload to Google Drive /Finance/Invoices/YYYY-MM/.  6. Log event to Monday “Sales – Orders Synced” board.  B) Invoice Archival &amp; USt ReportTrigger: Odoo event (invoice.posted).  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve posted invoice via Odoo API.  2. Generate PDF and archive to Drive under /Finance/Invoices/.  3. Extract VAT data and update monthly USt-Voranmeldung table in Drive.  4. Notify Accounting AI via MCP event “invoice_archived”.  5. Log run summary (invoice_id, timestamp, VAT value).  C) Stock ReconciliationTrigger: Scheduled hourly.  Flow Steps:  1. Pull Odoo stock.quant (warehouse levels).  2. Compare with WooCommerce product inventory (via SKU).  3. Update WooCommerce stock when deviation &gt; threshold (5%).  4. Notify Logistics AI and record variance report in Drive /Operations/Stock_Audit/.  5. Create Monday entry for discrepancies &gt;10 units.  D) Loyalty Points AllocationTrigger: WooCommerce “order.delivered”.  Flow Steps:  1. Identify customer and partner accounts.  2. Calculate myCred base points (per product or rule).  3. Apply bonuses based on tier (Partner Programs AI policy).  4. Update myCred ledger and sync to Odoo via odoo.points_adjust.  5. Write summary log to Drive /Loyalty/Transactions/YYYY-MM/.  E) Affiliate Payout GenerationTrigger: SliceWP conversion.status=“approved”.  Flow Steps:  1. Retrieve conversion details (amount, date, affiliate_id).  2. Compute payout using Drive /Partner_Policies/Commissions.xlsx.  3. Create payout record in Odoo (external_id='aff:{conversion_id}').  4. Notify Accounting AI for payment confirmation.  5. Update Monday “Affiliate Payments” board.  F) Daily Backups &amp; ReportsTrigger: Every midnight.  Flow Steps:  1. Export key datasets (orders, invoices, points, conversions).  2. Upload to Drive /Backups/Daily/YYYY-MM-DD/.  3. Summarize counts in Monday “Ops – System Health” board.  4. Trigger MCP event for AI performance metrics collection.  6) Error Handling &amp; DLQ• Retries: 3 automatic retries (30s, 2m, 5m).  • Errors pushed to DLQ (Drive /Logs/DLQ/).  • n8n sends MCP alert to Hairo Assistant for escalation.  • Monday “Automation Incidents” board receives failed run summary.  • DLQ entries older than 14 days auto-archived.  7) Security &amp; Access• Credentials stored in n8n Secret Vault (AES-256 encryption).  • Each node uses least-privilege credentials (read/write separation).  • HTTPS enforced for all connections.  • All logs contain correlation_id; sensitive fields masked (email, phone).  • Manual approvals for high-value invoice postings or partner payouts.  8) Monitoring &amp; Alerts• n8n sends daily operational summary to Monday via API.  • Alerts triggered when success rate &lt; 98%.  • Hairo Assistant reviews n8n logs weekly for optimization.  • Health Check API (/status) monitored by external uptime service.  9) Governance &amp; Versioning• All flows exported weekly to Drive (/Governance/n8n_Flows/Exports/).  • Naming Convention: {Department}_{Process}_v{major.minor}.json.  • Version tags aligned with AI departmental versions (e.g., AI-SALES-v2.3 → Flow v2.3).  • Change requests require testing in STAGING environment before production.  • Quarterly automation audit under Hairo Assistant oversight.
